mapper.insert: insert into reply_info(userid, contentid, content, score, ip, contentTypeId, title) values( #{userid}, #{contentid}, #{content}, ${score}, #{ip}, #{contentTypeId}, #{title})
mapper.update: update reply_info set content=#{content}, score=${score}, ip=#{ip} where no=${no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from reply_info where no=${no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select avg(score) from reply_info where contentid=#{param1}
